pageContent: Background and purpose: Criteria for determining the durability of the response to transrectal high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) ablation of prostate cancer have been established by calculating progression-free probability.

metaData.source:
Current evidence for focal therapy and partial gland ablation for organ-confined prostate cancer: systematic review of literature published in the last 2 years
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33196540/
